Class Hangman

java.lang.Object
  Hangman

public class Hangman
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple game of hangman where you attempt to guess the word with the number of characters given. If your guess of a character is incorrect, then you will make progress towards losing and the guillotine will slowly fall.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Evan Brown
